about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in Paradox: The Breaking of Time, a top-down puzzle game where you play, create, and share challenges with a vibrant community. Solve time-based puzzles using clones to unlock doors, evade traps, and manage Time Shifts. But beware—seeing your clones triggers a Paradox!

Clone Yourself

Clone yourself with a set amount of clones for each puzzle. Record their movements to activate switches or other devices that assist your other clones to move through the puzzle.

Avoid Paradoxes

Time Travel isn't all fun and games. If a clone sees another clone it will break time and reset part of the puzzle! Paradoxes can also be caused by traps like electric floors, lasers, pit falls, and more!

Difficulty Modes

Three different difficulty modes plus Hardcore variants to challenge you! Easy: Line of sight of sight and guided puzzles to help you learn. Normal: The original challenge with no lines of sight or guidance. Visible cloning paths still available to help your memory. Hard: Limited FOV and requires the best memory to remember where and what your clones are doing. Hardcore: After beating a level you can play it on Hardcore with each difficulty which resets the puzzle if you cause a paradox!

Custom Levels

Create your own custom levels and share them with friends and the community! Unlock more mechanics by progressing through the campaign.

Character Customization

Unlock cosmetics by playing through the game or purchasing some with Time Shards. Don't worry, Time Shards can be earned quite easily through gameplay and they don't need to be purchased if you want to unlock everything.

Features

  • 80+ Puzzles and challenges to overcome in the campaign

  • Various Time Travel based mechanics to learn and overcome

  • Gripping Story

  • Custom Level Maker

  • Character Customizer

  • Secret Level?
detailed_description:
The Contest

Fancy a bit of competition? How about earning real life rewards? Great at solving cryptic puzzles and secrets? Well then keep reading on! “The Contest” is currently active! The first 10 PLAYERS to find and beat the SECRET LEVEL in Paradox: The Breaking of Time will earn free Adamant Gaming Studios branded products FOR LIFE!!! What does that mean? It means anything branded Adamant Gaming Studios merchandise or games I will be giving away to you for life and as long as I, Timothy Harvey, have a say in it. “Now why would I want that?” great question! While my company may be small now, I believe it will grow into a power house gaming company! That could mean you playing one of my first games, beating a secret level, and enjoying yourself all while doing that. Could gain you access to the rest of my games for free! As part of winning this I will be offering at least two branded shirts, a hat, and a hoodie for starters. You will also gain exclusive early access to the next game I work on and get a chance to influence the development process.

Download the game or go to  for more details!
